notice_to_leave.pdf.title: Notice to Leave
notice_to_leave.pdf.notes: Prescribed form under Private Housing (Tenancies) (Scotland) Act 2016. Must give minimum 84 days notice (12 weeks). Cannot be served within first 6 months of tenancy. Updated April 2024 version.

form_e_eviction.pdf.title: Form E - Application for Eviction Order
form_e_eviction.pdf.notes: First-tier Tribunal for Scotland (Housing and Property Chamber) application form. Fee: £100. Must attach Notice to Leave and proof of service. Revised November 2022 version.

tribunal_info.name: First-tier Tribunal for Scotland (Housing and Property Chamber)
